data.comment: The match has started.
Parma Calcio's Yann Karamoh gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 1, Francesco Fourneau awards Milan a goal kick.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Milan.
In the minute 3, The match at Giuseppe Meazza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Matteo Gabbia, who is down injured.
The home team has substituted Matteo Gabbia with Pierre Kalulu. Stefano Pioli is thus making his first change.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 7, Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Milan.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Milan.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Hernani scores to make it 0-1 at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 13, Great play from Gervinho to set up the goal.
Milan push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Hakan Calhanoglu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Parma Calcio defence.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 15, Milan drive forward but Ante Rebic is judged offside.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Milan to check on Hernani, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 18, Hernani returns to the field for Parma Calcio after picking up a slight injury.
Milan to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 20, Parma Calcio surge into the attack at Giuseppe Meazza but Yann Karamohâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 23, Milan advance rapidly upfield but Francesco Fourneau blows for offside.
Gervinho for Parma Calcio is whistled offside.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 27, Milan's Brahim Diaz breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Milan.
In the minute 28, Francesco Fourneau signals a throw-in for Parma Calcio, close to Milan's area.
Parma Calcio needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Free kick Milan.
Important block from the Parma Calcio defence as Franck Kessie fires in a strike for Milan.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 31, In Milan, Franck Kessie (Milan) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Theo Hernandez for Milan has been booked by Francesco Fourneau and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
In the minute 37, Ante Rebic (Milan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Milan's Samu Castillejo misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 39, Can Milan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Milan have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Brahim Diaz hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Milan!
In the minute 40, Hakan Calhanoglu hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Milan.
Francesco Fourneau awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 41, Yordan Osorio (Parma Calcio) has received a first yellow card.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Milan throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
In the minute 43, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan's Samu Castillejo goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Milan are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Hakan Calhanoglu for Milan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Ismael Bennacer of Milan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Francesco Fourneau has blown to start the second-half.
Rafael Leao is on a sub for Samu Castillejo for Milan.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Brahim Diaz with Jens Hauge. This is the third substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan drive upfield and Franck Kessie gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Parma Calcio defender.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Milan.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Parma Calcio.
Francesco Fourneau awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Hakan Calhanoglu (Milan) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Milan.
In the minute 52, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Rafael Leao for Milan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Milan's Rafael Leao is back in action after a slight knock.
Theo Hernandez (Milan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 54, Milan have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Francesco Fourneau awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Milan.
In the minute 56, Goal! Jasmin Kurtic extends Parma Calcio lead to 0-2 with a header.
Hernani with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 58, Goal for Milan! They are now just 1-2 behind thanks to a Theo Hernandez header.
Hakan Calhanoglu instrumental with a fine assist.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Milan's half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Parma Calcio.
Milan's Ante Rebic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Parma Calcio defender.
Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Parma Calcio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Milan close to the penalty box.
Simone Iacoponi (Parma Calcio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Milan pushes forward through Hakan Calhanoglu, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 66, Free kick Milan.
In the minute 67, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Fabio Liverani (Parma Calcio) is making a first substitution, with Roberto Inglese replacing Andreas Cornelius.
Wylan Cyprien is replacing Yann Karamoh for Parma Calcio at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 69, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
In the minute 72, In Milan, Ismael Bennacer of Milan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Francesco Fourneau awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Ismael Bennacer is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 74, Simon Sohm is replacing Jasmin Kurtic for the away team.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Milan.
It seems as if Ismael Bennacer is unable to continue. Sandro Tonali replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Milan.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 77, Milan drives forward and Hakan Calhanoglu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Roberto Inglese (Parma Calcio) has received a yellow card from Francesco Fourneau.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Milan.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Free kick in a good position for Parma Calcio!
At Giuseppe Meazza, Davide Calabria has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 81, In Milan Parma Calcio drive forward through Gaston Brugman. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Milan push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Theo Hernandez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Parma Calcio defence.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 82, Parma Calcio's Roberto Inglese is whistled for offside at Giuseppe Meazza.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pierre Kalulu (Milan) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 84, In Milan Milan attack through Franck Kessie. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Giuseppe Meazza.
Throw-in Milan.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Milan's Pierre Kalulu attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 87, Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Parma Calcio make their fourth substitution with Maxime Busi replacing Hernani.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Francesco Fourneau awards the away team a throw-in.
Milan have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Giuseppe Meazza.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Theo Hernandez is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
